verses.verse: Give ear<WH238>, ye heavens<WH8064>, and I will speak<WH1696>; And let the earth<WH776> hear<WH8085> the words<WH561> of my mouth<WH6310>.

My doctrine<WH3948> shall drop<WH6201> as the rain<WH4306>; My speech<WH565> shall distil<WH5140> as the dew<WH2919>, As the small rain<WH8164> upon the tender grass<WH1877>, And as the showers<WH7241> upon the herb<WH6212>.
For I will proclaim<WH7121> the name<WH8034> of Jehovah<WH3068>: Ascribe<WH3051> ye greatness<WH1433> unto our God<WH430>.

The Rock<WH6697>, his work<WH6467> is perfect<WH8549>; For all his ways<WH1870> are justice<WH4941>: A God<WH410> of faithfulness<WH530> and without iniquity<WH5766>, Just<WH6662> and right is he<WH3477>.
They have dealt corruptly<WH7843> with him<WH3971>, they are not his children<WH1121>, it is their blemish<WH6141>; They are a perverse and crooked<WH6618> generation<WH1755>.

Do ye thus requite<WH1580> Jehovah<WH3068>, O foolish<WH5036> people<WH5971> and unwise<WH2450>? Is not he thy father<WH1> that hath bought<WH7069> thee<WH6213>? He hath made thee<WH3559>, and established thee.

Remember <WH2142> the days<WH3117> of old<WH5769>, Consider<WH995> the years<WH8141> of many<WH1755> generations<WH1755>: Ask<WH7592> thy father<WH1>, and he will show<WH5046> thee<WH2205>; Thine elders, and they will tell thee<WH559>.

When the Most High<WH5945> gave<WH5157> to the nations<WH1471> their inheritance<WH5157>, When he separated<WH6504> the children<WH1121> of men<WH120>, He set<WH5324> the bounds<WH1367> of the peoples<WH5971> According to the number<WH4557> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
For Jehovah<WH3068>'s portion<WH2506> is his people<WH5971>; Jacob<WH3290> is the lot<WH2256> of his inheritance<WH5159>.

He found<WH4672> him in a desert<WH4057> land<WH776>, And in the waste<WH8414> howling<WH3214> wilderness<WH3452>; He compassed him about<WH5437>, he cared<WH995> for him<WH5341>, He kept him as the apple<WH380> of his eye<WH5869>.

As an eagle<WH5404> that stirreth up<WH5782> her nest<WH7064>, That fluttereth<WH7363> over her young<WH1469>, He spread abroad<WH6566> his wings<WH3671>, he took<WH3947> them<WH5375>, He bare them on his pinions<WH84>.
Jehovah <WH3068> alone<WH910> did lead<WH5148> him<WH5236>, And there was no foreign god with him<WH410>.

He made him ride<WH7392> on the high places<WH1116> of the earth<WH776>, And he did eat<WH398> the increase<WH8570> of the field<WH7704>; And he made him to suck<WH3243> honey<WH1706> out of the rock<WH5553>, And oil<WH8081> out of the flinty<WH2496> rock<WH6697>;

Butter <WH2529> of the herd<WH1241>, and milk<WH2461> of the flock<WH6629>, With fat<WH2459> of lambs<WH3733>, And rams<WH352> of the breed<WH1121> of Bashan<WH1316>, and goats<WH6260>, With the<WH2459> finest<WH3629> of the wheat<WH2406>; And of the<WH2561> blood<WH1818> of the grape<WH6025> thou drankest wine<WH8354>.

But Jeshurun<WH3484> waxed fat<WH8080>, and kicked<WH1163>: Thou art waxed fat<WH8080>, thou art grown thick<WH5666>, thou art become sleek<WH3780>; Then he forsook<WH5203> God<WH433> who made<WH6213> him<WH5034>, And lightly esteemed the Rock<WH6697> of his salvation<WH3444>.
They moved him to jealousy<WH7065> with strange<WH2114> gods<WH8441>; With abominations provoked they him to anger<WH3707>.

They sacrificed<WH2076> unto demons<WH7700>, which were no God<WH433>, To gods<WH433> that they knew<WH3045> not<WH2319>, To new gods that came<WH935> up<WH935> of late<WH7138>, Which your fathers<WH1> dreaded not<WH8175>.
Of the Rock<WH6697> that begat<WH3205> thee thou art unmindful<WH7876>, And hast forgotten<WH7911> God<WH410> that gave thee birth<WH2342>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> saw<WH7200> it<WH5006>, and abhorred them<WH3708>, Because of the provocation of his sons<WH1121> and his daughters<WH1323>.

And he said<WH559>, I will hide<WH5641> my face<WH6440> from them<WH7200>, I will see what their end<WH319> shall be<WH8419>: For they are a very perverse generation<WH1755>, Children<WH1121> in whom is no faithfulness<WH529>.

They have moved me to jealousy<WH7065> with that which is not<WH3808> God<WH410>; They have provoked me to anger<WH3707> with their vanities<WH1892>: And I will move them to jealousy<WH7065> with those that are not a people<WH5971>; I will provoke them to anger<WH3707> with a foolish<WH5036> nation<WH1471>.

For a fire<WH784> is kindled<WH6919> in mine anger<WH639>, And burneth<WH3344> unto the lowest<WH8482> Sheol<WH7585>, And devoureth<WH398> the earth<WH776> with its increase<WH2981>, And setteth on fire<WH3857> the foundations<WH4144> of the mountains<WH2022>.
I will heap<WH5595> evils<WH7451> upon them<WH3615>; I will spend mine arrows upon them<WH2671>:

They shall be wasted<WH4198> with hunger<WH7458>, and devoured<WH3898> with burning heat<WH7565> And bitter<WH4815> destruction<WH6986>; And the teeth<WH8127> of beasts<WH929> will I send<WH7971> upon them<WH2534>, With the poison of crawling<WH2119> things of the dust<WH6083>.

Without <WH2351> shall the sword<WH2719> bereave<WH2315>, And in the chambers terror<WH367>; It shall destroy<WH7921> both young man<WH970> and virgin<WH1330>, The suckling<WH3243> with the man<WH376> of gray hairs<WH7872>.
I said<WH559>, I would scatter them afar<WH6284>, I would make the remembrance<WH2143> of them to cease<WH7673> from among men<WH582>;

Were it not<WH3884> that I feared<WH1481> the provocation<WH3708> of the enemy<WH341>, Lest their adversaries<WH6862> should judge amiss<WH5234>, Lest they should say<WH559>, Our hand<WH3027> is exalted<WH7311>, And Jehovah<WH3068> hath not done all this<WH6466>.
For they are a nation<WH1471> void<WH6> of counsel<WH6098>, And there is no understanding in them<WH8394>.
Oh that<WH3863> they were wise<WH2449>, that they understood<WH7919> this<WH995>, That they would consider their latter end<WH319>!

How should one<WH259> chase<WH7291> a thousand<WH505>, And two<WH8147> put ten<WH7233> thousand<WH505> to flight<WH5127>, Except<WH3808> their Rock<WH6697> had sold<WH4376> them<WH3588>, And Jehovah<WH3068> had delivered them up<WH5462>?
For their rock<WH6697> is not as our Rock<WH6697>, Even our enemies<WH341> themselves being judges<WH6414>.

For their vine<WH1612> is of the vine<WH1612> of Sodom<WH5467>, And of the fields<WH7709> of Gomorrah<WH6017>: Their grapes<WH6025> are grapes<WH6025> of gall<WH7219>, Their clusters<WH811> are bitter<WH4846>:
Their wine<WH3196> is the poison<WH2534> of serpents<WH8577>, And the cruel<WH393> venom<WH7219> of asps<WH6620>.
Is not this laid up in store<WH3647> with me<WH2856>, Sealed up among my treasures<WH214>?

Vengeance <WH5359> is mine<WH8005>, and recompense, At the time<WH6256> when their foot<WH7272> shall slide<WH4131>: For the day<WH3117> of their calamity<WH343> is at hand<WH7138>, And the things that are to come<WH6264> upon them shall make haste<WH2363>.

For Jehovah<WH3068> will judge<WH1777> his people<WH5971>, And repent<WH5162> himself for his servants<WH5650>; When he seeth<WH7200> that their power<WH3027> is gone<WH235>, And there is none<WH657> remaining<WH6113>, shut up or left at large<WH5800>.
And he will say<WH559>, Where are their gods<WH430>, The rock<WH6697> in which they took refuge<WH2620>;

Which did eat<WH398> the fat<WH2459> of their sacrifices<WH2077>, And drank<WH8354> the wine<WH3196> of their drink-offering<WH5257>? Let them rise up<WH6965> and help<WH5826> you<WH5643>, Let them be your protection.

See <WH7200> now that I<WH430>, even I, am he, And there is no god with me<WH4191>: I kill, and I make alive<WH2421>; I wound<WH4272>, and I heal<WH7495>; And there is none that can deliver<WH5337> out of my hand<WH3027>.
For I lift up<WH5375> my hand<WH3027> to heaven<WH8064>, And say<WH559>, As I live<WH2416> for ever<WH5769>,

If I whet<WH8150> my glittering<WH1300> sword<WH2719>, And my hand<WH3027> take hold<WH270> on judgment<WH4941>; I will render<WH7725> vengeance<WH5359> to mine adversaries<WH6862>, And will recompense<WH7999> them that hate me<WH8130>.

I will make mine arrows<WH2671> drunk<WH7937> with blood<WH1818>, And my sword<WH2719> shall devour<WH398> flesh<WH1320>; With the blood<WH1818> of the slain<WH2491> and the captives<WH7633>, From the head<WH7218> of the leaders<WH6546> of the enemy<WH341>.

Rejoice <WH7442>, O ye nations<WH1471>, with his people<WH5971>: For he will avenge<WH5358> the blood<WH1818> of his servants<WH5650>, And will render<WH7725> vengeance<WH5359> to his adversaries<WH6862>, And will make expiation<WH3722> for his land<WH127>, for his people<WH5971>.
And Moses<WH4872> came<WH935> and spake<WH1696> all the words<WH1697> of this song<WH7892> in the ears<WH241> of the people<WH5971>, he<WH1954>, and Hoshea the son<WH1121> of Nun<WH5126>.
And Moses<WH4872> made an end<WH3615> of speaking<WH1696> all these words<WH1697> to all Israel<WH3478>;

And he said<WH559> unto them<WH7760>, Set your heart<WH3824> unto all the words<WH1697> which I testify<WH5749> unto you this day<WH3117>, which ye shall command<WH6680> your children<WH1121> to observe<WH8104> to do<WH6213>, even all the words<WH1697> of this law<WH8451>.

For it is no vain<WH7386> thing<WH1697> for you<WH2416>; because it is your life, and through this thing<WH1697> ye shall prolong<WH748> your days<WH3117> in the land<WH127>, whither ye go over<WH5674> the Jordan<WH3383> to possess it<WH3423>.
And Jehovah<WH3068> spake<WH1696> unto Moses<WH4872> that selfsame<WH6106> day<WH3117>, saying<WH559>,

Get thee up<WH5927> into this mountain<WH2022> of Abarim<WH5682>, unto mount<WH2022> Nebo<WH5015>, which is in the land<WH776> of Moab<WH4124>, that is over against<WH6440> Jericho<WH3405>; and behold<WH7200> the land<WH776> of Canaan<WH3667>, which I give<WH5414> unto the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> for a possession<WH272>;

and die<WH4191> in the mount<WH2022> whither thou goest up<WH5927>, and be gathered<WH622> unto thy people<WH5971>, as Aaron<WH175> thy brother<WH251> died<WH4191> in mount<WH2022> Hor<WH2023>, and was gathered<WH622> unto his people<WH5971>:

because ye trespassed<WH4603> against me in the midst<WH8432> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> at the waters<WH4325> of Meribah of Kadesh<WH4808>, in the wilderness<WH4057> of Zin<WH6790>; because ye sanctified<WH6942> me not in the midst<WH8432> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
For thou shalt see<WH7200> the land<WH776> before thee<WH935>; but thou shalt not go thither into the land<WH776> which I give<WH5414> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>.
